rows.label: qst202711_msg0001
rows.name:
It's quite noisy, mo. We're in the
middle of an important ritual...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202711_msg0002
rows.name: I'd like you not to interfere, mo.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0003
rows.name: Lord Moe will be revived soon, mo...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202711_msg0004
rows.name: Lord Moe?

rows.label: qst202711_msg0005
rows.name:
Hmm, so this is a ritual
to summon a demon.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0006
rows.name:
Yes! The Rite of Erasure, a
ritual to summon the great
Nopon demon, Lord Moe, mo!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0007
rows.name: Rite of Erasure...[ML:Dash ] Nice name.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0008
rows.name: So, why do you want to revive Lord Moe?

rows.label: qst202711_msg0009
rows.name: Alst is covered in sorrow, mo.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0010
rows.name: War, poverty, discrimination, abuse...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202711_msg0011
rows.name: And the death of the Divine Beasts...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202711_msg0012
rows.name:
This Alst cannot escape
its destiny of ruin, mo.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0013
rows.name: Therefore!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0014
rows.name:
We Nopon will summon the
great demon, Lord Moe!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0015
rows.name: And regenerate this Alst, mo!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0016
rows.name:
In short, you want the
Nopon to take over?

rows.label: qst202711_msg0017
rows.name: Hah...[ML:Dash ] What a foolish idea.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0018
rows.name: It's not foolish, mo!!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0019
rows.name:
Acedia, Superbia,
Invidia, and Luxuria...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0020
rows.name:
They only think of their
own interests, mo!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0021
rows.name:
The young Nopon all hold
great dissatisfaction with
the other races, mo.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0022
rows.name:
To them, the Nopon are
like pets or handy-men...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202711_msg0023
rows.name:
They treat us Nopon with
contempt, and in the end, they
have twisted this world, mo!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0024
rows.name:
So to take back the world, we
must send the feelings of the
oppressed Nopon to Lord Moe...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202711_msg0025
rows.name:
and have him destroy everything
and create a new world, mo!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0026
rows.name:
Hey...[ML:Dash ] I wasn't making fun
of the Nopon's situation.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0027
rows.name:
I said the idea of borrowing
the power of something that
doesn't exist is foolish.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0028
rows.name:
If you want to change the world,
don't rely on demons or gods! Don't
rely on others, change it yourself!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0029
rows.name:
In the end, what you're doing is just
giving up without even trying...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202711_msg0030
rows.name:
You're no different from a
baby throwing a tantrum!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0031
rows.name:
Mo mo mo! I will not forgive
such an insult, mo!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0032
rows.name: But Lord Moe will descend soon, mo!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0033
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Fuhahaha!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0034
rows.name: Now! Change the world, mo!
